hibernate-mapping.query: select distinct ua from omis.user.domain.UserAccount as ua inner join fetch ua.user as user inner join fetch user.name as name order by name.lastName, name.firstName, ua.username
from omis.user.domain.UserAccount as ua where ua.user = :user order by ua.username
from omis.user.domain.UserAccount as ua where upper(ua.username) = :username order by ua.username

select userAccount from omis.user.domain.UserAccount userAccount inner join userAccount.user user inner join user.name userName where upper(userName.lastName) like upper('%' || :query || '%') or upper(userName.firstName) like upper('%' || :query || '%') or upper(userAccount.username) like upper('%' || :query || '%')

select userAccount from omis.user.domain.UserAccount userAccount inner join userAccount.user user inner join user.name userName where userName.lastName like '%' || :query || '%' or userName.firstName like '%' || :query || '%' or userAccount.username like '%' || :query || '%'
select count(userAccount.id) from omis.user.domain.UserAccount userAccount where userAccount.user = :user

select userAccount from omis.user.domain.UserGroupMembership as userGroupMembership inner join userGroupMembership.userAccount as userAccount inner join userGroupMembership.userGroup as userGroup where userGroup = :userGroup
